nodes.text: The Yagaran Four were a team of bounty hunters.

The Yagaran Four flew a heavily armed YT-1300 light freighter. The Krish mechanic Maniac worked for the Four and they insisted that he modify the hyperdrive on their YT-1300. Maniac worked on the drive, but his modifications pushed it right to the edge of its capabilities. The Four engaged the hyperdrive while in persuit of a bounty near the world Elin Roe and the drive malfunctioned, causing the ship to explode.
